first_translate: the training grounds at the royal palace...
gah...!
what’s wrong?
where did all that energy go just now?!
huh?
w-where’d you come from?
hmph.
is this really your best shot?
I can’t believe these are supposed to be the crown prince’s guards.
it looks like they’re the ones who need protection instead.
argh...
a mere boy is beating us...!!!
doesn’t he ever get tired?!

hangle: 사생아 주제에, 겨우 스무 살 먹은 애송이 주제에.
first_translate: and on top of being illegitimate, he's only twenty years old!

hangle: 다들 날 보고 그런 생각이나 했겠지.
first_translate: that must’ve been what everyone was thinking about me.

hangle: 역시 대련 핑계로 서열 정리를 하길 잘했군.
first_translate: I’m glad I decided to use sparring as my way of establishing order here.
he’s such a monster...!!!
your highness.
you have a visitor.
a visitor?

hangle: 훈련 중에 방해받는 건 좋아하지 않으니,
first_translate: I don’t want any interruptions during my training session,
so tell them to leave if possible.
yes--

hangle: 그럼 피오나 헤일론 영애께는 돌아가시라고 전하겠습니다.
first_translate: then shall I send away miss fiona haylorne?
no.
forget it.
I’ll see her right away.

hangle: 땀과 먼지를 뒤집어쓰고 피오나 영애를 만나러 갈 순 없으니,
first_translate: but since I can’t meet her covered in sweat and dust,
get everything ready for me so I can wash up quickly.

hangle: 그동안 피오나 영애가 지루하지 않도록 정중히 대접하고.
first_translate: make sure she feels welcome while she waits.
as for you lot, run fifty laps around the training field.
all of you.
pardon?!
exactly who is this fiona haylorne girl...
...that makes him do anything?
I didn’t think fiona would visit first.
siegren, did you know...

hangle: 내가 누구라고 소문이 났는 지 알고 있었어?
first_translate: ...about the rumors going around about me?
apparently people call you “the guardian of winter”!
the guardian of winter?

hangle: 헤일론에서 널 그렇게 부르는 놈들이 있기는 했지.
first_translate: there were some guys back home who called you that too.
really?!
yeah.

hangle: 넌 주위를 신경 쓰는 성격이 아니라 몰랐겠지만.
first_translate: though you probably never noticed because you weren’t interested in hearing things like that.
this is kind of embarrassing...
it doesn’t have to be.
they said those things because you truly deserved it.
now I feel even more embarrassed after you put it that way.

hangle: 그나저나 시그렌이 구박받고 있을까 봐 걱정했는데…
first_translate: at least it seems like no one has bullied you yet.
I'm relieved to hear that.
even the maids seem fond of you.
why...
aren’t you cute...
listen.

hangle: 나, 상대한테 겨울의 수호자라고 불렸을 때 조금 설렜다?
first_translate: when someone told me I was known as "the guardian of winter," I felt pretty excited.
just like that maid over there.
who exactly told you that?
be nice, your highness.
why does it matter?

hangle: 널 설레게 했으니 친구로서 감사 인사라도 하러 가야지.
first_translate: if they made you happy, then I'd like to thank them personally.
fiona always says strange things sometimes.

hangle: 나한테 그 말을 해준 사람은 리비아 영애야.
first_translate: lady livia was the one who mentioned it to me.
do you know her?
livia?
I could swear she was part of house priscilla...
wait a minute.
she’s a woman though.
you never said you got excited when a man complimented you before.
maybe I'll hold off on thanking her later.
I suddenly feel better.
I don’t know why,
but whatever makes siegren happy works for me.
why are you staring at me like that again?
like I've said before, you often look at me with eyes like that.
I still don’t understand why.
fiona.
you said you had to win the hunting competition, correct?
right.
oh, so you heard already.

hangle: 아벨, 이 아니라 스승님이 말해 주던데.
first_translate: not directly from abel but through his master.

hangle: 사실 나도 그 사냥대회에 나가는 데 말이야.
first_translate: to be honest, I also plan on participating in the tournament myself.
really?!
in that case we’re rivals!
rivals?
me against you...?

hangle: 솔직히 황태자나 다른 기사들은 이길 수 있을 거라 생각하는데,
first_translate: while I thought I might stand a chance against the other knights or even the crown prince himself,
I wasn’t expecting you to join.

hangle: 난 네가 참가하지 말라고 하면 안 할 건데.
first_translate: I won’t participate if you ask me not to.
uhh...
why...?
well...

hangle: 이 정도는 사교계에서 다들 하는 건데,
first_translate: everyone else in high society will be doing it anyway,
and besides, I’m not your rival. I’m your partner.
with siegren joining, our chances of winning skyrocket...!!
come on!
stop saying stuff like that.

hangle: 너도 황자가 되고 첫 사냥 대회잖아.
first_translate: it’s your very first hunting competition as the new crown prince.

hangle: 네 실력을 보여 줄 좋은 기회를 쉽게 날릴 수는 없지!
first_translate: how could you pass up such a great opportunity to show off your skills?
on top of that, if there happens to be a young lady you fancy,

hangle: 대회에서 멋진 모습을 보여줄 수도 있고!
first_translate: you may impress her by showing how cool you are at the event!
I guess I ended up blurting out something silly due to embarrassment...

hangle: 이 사냥 대회는 사실 원작에서도 있었던 이벤트로,
first_translate: the hunting competition actually took place in the original novel as well.

hangle: 소설 속 시그렌은 대회에서 우승하여 유니스에게 마물을 바쳤었다.
first_translate: novel-siegren participated in the contest and offered eunice the beast he hunted down.

hangle: 그리고 이것은 단순히 마물을 잡는걸 넘어서
first_translate: this isn’t simply a game where participants hunt monsters;
it’s an event filled with romance among the younger nobles!

hangle: 마물을 잡아 흠모하는 상대나 연인에게 사냥감을 바치기!라 대대로 인기가 좋다.
first_translate: participants catch beasts and offer their prey to whoever they admire or love! thus, it remains popular generation after generation.
many couples end up getting married thanks to this tradition!
“a young lady you fancy,” huh?
of course, that’s partially true.
i-is there someone?!

hangle: 내가 모르는 사이 유니스와 만난 걸까?
first_translate: has he met eunice without telling me?
th-that’s good ne--
yes.
you’re misunderstanding.
